Linear Discriminant Analysis

A classifier with a linear decision boundary.

Inputs

  • numpy.ndarray: Training data
  • numpy.ndarray: Labels of training data
  • numpy.ndarray: Target data

Outputs

  • numpy.ndarray: Labels of target data
